title: My red velvet cake
ingredients: ['310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 bottle (about 50ml) red food colouring', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '115g unsalted butter', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '235ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon white vinegar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda']
